{{Wired embedded system |brand=Seagate |model=Personal Cloud |revision=2-Bay (SRN22C) |asin=B00PZZZEAG |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=Currently Shipping |price=285 |est_release_date=11/2014 |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6707;ARMADA 370; |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L8006E |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646D-BYK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 8-pin header |serial=yes,, 8-pin header |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1518 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2-port USB 3.0 PCIe Controller;ASMedia;ASM1024A;;1; |flags=power switch, heatsink |stock_boot=U-Boot;2011.12; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.72; |tp_firmware=Debian |oui_eth=00:10:75 }} {{TagLine|Personal Cloud 2-Bay}} :{{SupportPage|http://www.seagate.com/support/network-attached-storage/home-network/personal-cloud/}}
"Searcher/Cumulus/Max-NAS 88F6707", "7D21UL740D1E1 NH3UL7" :and "REV:D1 2014.10.23" are silkscreened on the main board.
*[https://wiki.debian.org/InstallingDebianOn/Seagate/PersonalCloud Installing Debian]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F6707 @1.2GHz (ARM v7) *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) SDRAM *Storage: 1MB (CMOS) Serial Flash, 2x SATA 3.0 *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 4A via barrel
===Models=== *[[Seagate Personal Cloud]] (SRN21C) *[[Seagate Personal Cloud 2-Bay]] (SRN22C)
==Images== <gallery> File:Seagate SRN21C Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Seagate SRN21C Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
